content.rendered:
Laman Seri is a freehold development in Shah Alam, Selangor, West Malaysia. It offers a tranquil respite from the hustle and bustle of the city and also excellent accessibility to town centres like Subang Jaya, USJ and Puchong via the well-connected highways.

It is also surrounded by mature neighbourhoods with fully developed amenities, such as reputable colleges and local schools. With enhanced security providing single point entry and exit and perimeter fencing, it comprises 112 units of spacious semi-detached and linked houses. These are tastefully designed with an indoor courtyard concept and a unique community linear park at the centre of the estate.
